channel.title: CVE Feed for Brontobytes -- Cookie Bar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brontobytes -- Cookie Bar

item.title: CVE-2023-49836|2023-12-14T14:10:01.196Z -- brontobytes -- cookie%20bar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Brontobytes Cookie Bar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Cookie Bar: from n/a through 2.0.
